entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [mono] Loader/classloader/StaticVirtualMethods/RegressionTests/GitHub_71319 crashes with runtime assertion failure #71910
  • JIT: typeof() is not propagated/folded #71909
    8.0.0
  • GRPC error after upgrading from .netcoreapp3.1 to .net5 or .net6 #71906
  • [API Proposal]: IBinaryInteger<TSelf> read methods #71902

Closed

  • XmlElement's constructor should have a nullable `prefix` parameter #71858
    7.0.0
  • HttpQSCollection inside of System.Web.HttpUtility has bug in its ToString() #71871
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicListener #67560
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-23267 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #69149
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.Tests.ZipFile_Create.UpdateAddFile #63562
  • Add String.JoinLines or EnumerableExtensions.JoinLines #64895
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-24512 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #66348
  • span.copyto(span) crashes at linux-arm64 platform in .net6 #66082
  • [wasm] Int64 marshaling is corrupting data which could not fit JS `Number` #69394
    7.0.0
  • [WASM] Better double (F64) support in MonoPlatform.ts #65959
  • Introduce generic math LINQ operators #71901
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Type #59704
    7.0.0
  • RyuJIT: IsValueType and IsAssignableFrom optimizations aren't inlining friendly. #40381
    7.0.0
  • Regressions from loop alignment fixes #71646
    7.0.0
  • Is .NET 4.8.1 on Windows ARM64 an ARM64EC binary? #71897
  • [API Proposal]: Software #71894
  • [API Proposal]: Ioc can load configuration from config file #71832
  • Vector128.Create() codegen: ReadOnlySpan<byte> vs. byte[] overloads #71885
    7.0.0
  • We should flow the CancellationToken to Http2Connection.SetupAsync #70721
    7.0.0
  • Aes.Create returns null #70290

PullRequests

Created

  • Add --instruction-set:skylake, etc. (groups of instructions sets) #71911
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix contract customization being silently ignored over pre-existing JsonIgnoreCondition configuration #71908
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • PeriodicTimer add missing XML documentation #71904
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution

Merged

  • PeriodicTimer XML documentation improvement #71905
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Redo minor cleanups in System.Runtime.Numerics #71274
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix annotation on XmlElement constructor parameter #71860
    area-System.Xml, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fix HttpQSCollection.ToString to not throw #71903
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] API QuicListener #71579
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add runtime reflection tests for generic constraints #71898
    area-System.Reflection
  • Update deep-dive-blog-posts.md #71907
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Propagate typeof() during inlining #71778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not compact blocks around loops #71868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm-mt] Fixup after Emscripten 3.1.12 bump #71893
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fix miscellaneous typos #71896
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Vectorize Convert.ToBase64String #71795
  • Pass CancellationToken to Http2Connection SetupAsync #70906
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code #71892
  • Update string marshallers to V2 shape #71849
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add AggressiveInlining to a couple of Vector.Create methods #71889
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Convert a few trivial Type, RuntimeType and Enum FCalls to C# #71873
    area-System.Reflection

Updated

  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #71516
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Rebucket tests that fail with NativeAOT and fix some #71819
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Regression test for GitHub issue #71319 #71461
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [QUIC] API QuicConnection #71783
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove GTF_CALL_M_UNMGD_THISCALL and badcode on thiscall with 0 args #71882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Fix BigInteger out-of-bound index during GCD calculation #71671
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Provide upgrade response details #71757
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Remove ThreadPool native implementation #71719
    area-System.Threading
  • Add Kerberos loopback test #71824
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable `S.T.RegularExpressions FunctionalTests` tests failing due to linker crash #71875
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • PipeReaderStream.ReadInternal throws AggregateException unexpectedly #70248
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
